thread.title: Tarte's Quench Lip Rescues Are the Perfect Pout Product For Mermaid-Lovers
thread.title_full: Tarte's Quench Lip Rescues Are the Perfect Pout Product For Mermaid-Lovers

author: Emily Orofino
title: Tarte's Quench Lip Rescues Are the Perfect Pout Product For Mermaid-Lovers
text:
Tarte Quench Lip Rescue New Shades Summer 2017 Tarte's Quench Lip Rescues Are the Perfect Pout Product For Mermaid-Lovers March 10, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Tarte's Quench Lip Rescues Are the Perfect Pout Product For Mermaid-Lovers 
We'll admit it: too often, we'll buy a beauty product simply for its pretty packaging. Occasionally, though, this can backfire. Not all gorgeous compacts, tubes, or jars have quality formulas inside. However, as fans of both mermaid-inspired prints and nourishing lip treatments, we were immensely satisfied by Tarte's Quench Lip Rescues — and the brand just launched four new amazing shades. 
In case you haven't tried this product before, each hue has a different, darling tube with different aquatic themes such as seahorses, starfish, and coral (which makes them both collectible and easy to find in an overstuffed makeup bag). Inside each is a superhydrating lip balm that leaves your pout with a subtle tint, glossy sheen, and refreshed sensation. 
For Summer 2017, Tarte has expanded its color offerings to include coral, warm buff, clear, and (our favorite) a punchy cherry red that would look fantastic when donned poolside. See them for yourself — as well as the original four hues! — and shop them when you read on. Related:
